document_data.name: Ali al-Mustasib
document_data.mainbody: '''Ali al-Mustasib''' lived in [[Iris Well Spring]] in the [[Hordelands]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Atabeg Ali al-Mustasib was an exiled ruler of [[Semphar]] who was forced to live in the small community of Iris Well Spring located to the east of Semphar. A jailer visited him yearly to deliver supplies and confirm that he remained in exile without fleeing.
document_data.Activities: Ali viewed the [[Tuigan]] horde under [[Yamun Khahan]] as a way to possibly retain control in Semphar. The Khahan's son, [[Hubadai Khahan|Hubadai]], used information gathered from Ali to plan his invasion of Semphar. Ali was rewarded for this information with a spot on Hubadai's military council. Ali's daughter was also taken as a royal concubine to ensure his further cooperation.
document_data.Relationships: Ali was the father of [[Dura al-Mustasib]].
